name: DailyGermanWord
skdetail:
This skill contains: dynamic content.
Invocation Name: daily german
des: Daily German Word will allow you to learn a new word in the German language every day. With over 3000 words in our database, Daily German Word has a vast amount of terms that will teach you new and obscure terms you might not otherwise come across
priv: The developer reported that this skill does not collect personal information.
